tool_description: Get the best quality fundamental data and latest price for all stocks listed in India
name: Indian_Stock_Price_And_Fundamentals
title: Indian_Stock_Price_And_Fundamentals

api_list.name: Get Yesterday's Share Price For All Listed Indian Companies
api_list.description: Get Yesterday's Share Price For All Listed Indian Companies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indian_stock_price_and_fundamentals.p.rapidapi.com/YesterdayClosingPrice"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indian_stock_price_and_fundamentals.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
